sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
This gallant caualiero Dicke Bovvyer newly acted. Trial of chivalry.
[76] p.
Printed by Simon Stafford for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, neere S. Austens gate, London : 1605.
Erroneously attributed to William Wager. Either a reissue with cancel title page or else a title variant of "The history of the tryall of chevalry"--the evidence of existing copies is inconclusive. Partly in verse. Signatures: A⁴ (+-A1?) B-I⁴ K² . Running title reads: The history of the tryall of cheualry. Identified as STC 24935b on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Cropped and inlaid; A2-4 in photostat from a Bodleian copy.
=======
This gallant caualiero Dicke Bovvyer newly acted. Trial of chivalry.
[76] p.
Printed by Simon Stafford for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, neere S. Austens gate, London : 1605.
Erroneously attributed to William Wager. Either a reissue with cancel title page or else a title variant of "The history of the tryall of chevalry"--the evidence of existing copies is inconclusive. Partly in verse. Signatures: A⁴ (+-A1?) B-I⁴ K² . Running title reads: The history of the tryall of cheualry. Identified as STC 24935b on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Cropped and inlaid; A2-4 in photostat from a Bodleian copy.
Nathaniel Butter
Simon Stafford
his shop in Paules Church-yard, neere S. Austens gate
